message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a fair price given its value. Let me know your thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm unable to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. This is still a good deal for you considering the product's value.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. However, I am still unable to meet at $10,250. I would like to propose $10,000 for the product. This is the maximum I can afford while staying within my budget.
